q: shake-up. Current Google CEO Eric Schmidt will serve as the company's executive chairman. Co-founder Sergey Brin will devote his time to strategic projects, in particular working on new products, the company said. We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time, Eric Schmidt said in a statement. Jay Gruden hasn't received any overriding direction from Marvin Lewis on how to run the offense. "He's the head coach, so whatever vision he has is my vision," Jay Gruden said. If he has a vision of running the ball 30 times, then that's going to be the vision. We'll do the best we can to appease him. But there's been no vision that's been told to me right now.
